caption: Project: Falling Cube
content: A logic puzzle where a cube spawns on a random path of tiles. The cube must reach the end and also step on every tile along the way. The maps are generated using C++ and iterations on a grid.

caption: Started Online Classes
content: I started 3 online college class through the University of Helsinki! I'm looking forward to the opportunity to earn some certificates and possibly credits.

caption: Project: Tile World
content: A project for procedurally generated biomes using C++. I use 3D tiles of different material: dirt, grass, and stone. Water may be added later for ocean generation.

caption: New Job: CyberSecurity TA
content: I got a new job! I'm excited to announce that I'm the newest TA for eDX's CyberSec Bootcamps.

caption: Project: Procedural Terrain
content: A project in which I generate random maps using perlin noise and the diamond square algorithm in Unreal Engine C++.
